content: I am a PhD student in Machine Learning at CNRS in the Inria SequeL/ScooL team. My supervisors are Emilie Kaufmann and Odalric-Ambryn Maillard. I study the problem of exploration in the bandits models, but my research interest also include reinforcement learning and machine learning in general.

title: Dorian Baudry
